common.general_error_paragraph: We are unable to retrieve the information you are looking for right now. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Altinn Servicedesk.

authent_overviewpage.sub_title_text: By creating a system access, you give a vendor system access to solve tasks in Altinn on behalf of your company.
authent_overviewpage.created_system_user_title: You have now created this system access:
authent_overviewpage.system_user_no_rights: The system access has no rights
authent_overviewpage.system_rights_header: The system access has rights to these services:
authent_overviewpage.no_key_role1: You do not have sufficient rights.
authent_overviewpage.no_key_role2: To create a system access you need the role Access controller, Main administrator or General manager

authent_creationpage.input_field_label: Give the system access a name
authent_creationpage.content_text1: If you are unsure about which vendor system to choose, we recommend that you contact the provider of the vendor system. Altinn has not made any assessment of the quality and safety of the vendor systems in the list.
authent_creationpage.name_too_long: Name of system access cannot be longer than 255 characters, you have entered {{ nameLength }} characters.

authent_includedrightspage.sub_title: The system access will contain these services
authent_includedrightspage.content_text: These services are pre-selected by the vendor system.

authent_detailpage.delete_systemuser_body: Are you sure you want to delete the system access "{{title}}"?
authent_detailpage.no_rights: The system access has no rights
authent_detailpage.name_too_long: Name of system access cannot be longer than 255 characters, you have entered {{ nameLength }} characters.

authent_maskinporten.upload_jwk_format: TODO:  Last opp i jwk i format
authent_maskinporten.upload_description: TODO: Maskinporten krever at du oppdaterer JWK hver 12. måned. Hvis JWK ikke oppdateres vil integrasjonen slutte å virke.
authent_maskinporten.no_file_uploaded: TODO: Ingen fil opplastet ennå (maks er 64 kB).
authent_maskinporten.uploaded_file_info: TODO: Fil opplastet er {{filename}}, størrelse er {{filesize}} bytes.

error_page.find_and_submit_scheme: Find and submit a new form
error_page.not_found_site_header: Oh! You've tried to reach a page we don't know about
error_page.not_found_site_upper_text: We don't know where you were actually going, but maybe you can find what you're looking for on some of these pages:
error_page.not_found_site_lower_text: If this did not help, you can contact Altinn user support by phone 75 00 60 00
